definition[0]: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard
example[0]: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
example[1]: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
example[2]: Frances achieved very good exam results.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say someone gets a result rather than achieves it:
example[3]: He got good grades in his final exams.
definition[1]: to be successful in a particular kind of job or activity
example[4]: We want all our students to achieve within their chosen profession.
